org.transitime.db.structs

Class ActiveRevisions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.db.structs.ActiveRevisions

  • @Entity
public class ActiveRevisions
extends java.lang.Object
    For keeping track of current revisions. This table should only have a single row, one that specified the configRev and the travelTimesRev currently being used.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

      • setTravelTimesRev

        public void setTravelTimesRev(int travelTimeRev)
        Sets the travel time rev. Doesn't write it to db though. To write to db should flush the session that the object was read in by.
        Parameters:
